sentences.translation: 多数人都将面纱取了下来。

sentences.sentence: They didn't have burkas, and they immediately came up and talked to me.
sentences.translation: 她们没有戴头巾，并且立即就站起来和我交谈。

sentences.sentence: "I saw two women on the side of the mountain, in burkas and without a man," wrote photographer Lynsey Addario.
sentences.translation: “我看到在山的旁边有两个女人，她们都穿着长袍而没有一个男人，”摄影师冷撒·阿达·利欧(lynsey Addario)写道。
